title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull-run workflow.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library providing synchronous and async APIs to chat, generate, embed, and list local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama models as LLM and chat components for chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured open-source web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder-style API, streaming, and embedding support; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API; generate, chat, pull, and delete models from Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with prompt templates, conversation history, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completions.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes showing how to integrate Ollama with LangChain, LlamaIndex, Docker, Ray, and more.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling options.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components for building LLM pipelines in Haystack.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local LLM chat to servers using Ollama backends with slash commands and moderation.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service inside CI pipelines for testing code with local LLM calls.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Bolt JS that answers questions via Ollama models and supports threads and app mentions.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP, streaming, and model management utilities; published to Nimble.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate exposing strongly-typed async functions for chat, generate, embeddings, and model ops via reqwest.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All-compatible UI fork adapted to talk to Ollama backends, offering model switching and local chat sessions.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with chat, generate, and embeddings endpoints; targets .NET 6+ and NuGet published.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of Retrieval-Augmented Generation using Ollama, Chroma, and LangChain in a single Docker Compose stack.
